info.name: Growth System
info.description:
Growth system based on something I read in A New Kind Of Science

http://www.wolframscience.com/nks/p373--the-growth-of-crystals/

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define T(u,v) texture(iChannel0, U/R + vec2(u,v)/R).x
void mainImage( out vec4 f, in vec2 U )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy;
    float tL = T(-1, 1),
          tM = T(0, 1),
          tR = T(1, 1),
          mL = T(-1, 0),
          mM = T(0, 0),
          mR = T(1, 0),
          bL = T(-1, -1),
          bM = T(0, -1),
          bR = T(1, -1),
          e = tL + tM + tR + mL + mR + bL + bM + bR;

    // From Fabrice https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4dGSWR
    mM == 1. ? f = vec4(1.) :
    f = vec4(   iFrame < 1&&length(U/R-.5) < .005 // initial state
              ||e == 2. // Change this value for some cool stuff
              ||e == 1.
             );                                                
}
renderpass.name: Buf A
